entry.title: Metropolis Blue
entry.content:
Metropolis Blue is a joint venture by Metropolis Studios and ACM. The label is run by - and dedicated to - students of the university.

My role in the label is currently Marketing and Videography. As part of the Videography role I am in charge of the team that are dedicated to producing high quality content. This includes live events, interviews and acoustic sessions.

On the 11th of March 2019 we released a short showreel of our first live event.
entry.summary: Metropolis Blue is a joint venture by Metropolis Studios and ACM. The label is run by - and dedicated to - students of the university.

entry.title: Metropolis Blue: Showreel
entry.content:
After a successful launch party for the student-run Metropolis Blue record label I created this short montage to show off some of the best moments from the night.

A big thank you to the team, Joe Dallison and Kailan Blanks for helping film the night.

Side note: Can you spot the footage that was shot on an iPhone? Follow up post coming soon.
entry.summary: After a successful launch party for the student-run Metropolis Blue record label I created this short montage to show off some of the best moments from the night.

entry.title: BRUCH: Artist Takeover playlist
entry.content:
An artist I am currently managing, BRUCH, has published an “influences” playlist. There’s some great stuff on here and I recommend checking it out!

Click here to visit the playlist.
entry.summary: An artist I am currently managing, BRUCH, has published an “influences” playlist. There’s some great stuff on here and I recommend checking it out!
